item.description:
Summer Finale Afterwork Mixer at Houston's.

For young professionals alike in the heart of Boston's Faneuil Hall District. 6:15-9:30pm.

The Afterwork mixer returns this Thursday September 14th at Houston's in the heart of Faneuil Hall. There have been requests from many of our new members for this venue. We had our first Afterwork Mixer at this upscale venue and was a tremendous sucess. So please come out and have a few cocktails with the group as we gear up for the last official weekend of the summer season!

Meeting details: If the patio is open we will meet there, if not we will meet at the bar on the right side from the main entrance. This place is packed on Thurs nites so I highly ENCOURAGE you to attend early as possible. My picture is on the site under the Assistant Organizer section so I should not be hard to find. My phone is 617-671-5310. Please make note prior to arriving. See you there!

Steven

Public Transportation:

Green/Blue Line to Government Center
Orange Line to State St.
Red Line to Park St

For more information, see http://boston.citysea...

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Summer Finale Afterwork Mixer
